articles.title: Asia may witness sharp drop in crude inflow from Africa by end of 2022: S&P Global | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Increased competition from European refiners as they cut back on Russian crudes for alternative crudes including African grades, which will likely continue as the EU’s sanctions come into force by early December
articles.content: New Delhi: Asia may end the year 2022 with a sharp drop in crude inflows from Africa because of the higher freight rates, a wider Brent-Dubai spread and increased competition from European refiners l… [+2160 chars]

articles.title: ESA - How MIRI became Webb's coolest instrument - European Space Agency
articles.description: The NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope is widely referred to as the successor to the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope. In reality, it is the successor to a lot more than that. With the inclusion of the Mid-InfraRed Instrument (MIRI), Webb also became a su…
